topics.body:
I would drink about 6 cups of coffee and take an adderall. Actuall on a school night, I stayed up alllll night and didnt sleep. I thought 6 cups of coffee would help, so I took that and my adderall. After first period I felt so fucking sick. Like I had the flu or something. I came down pretty hard, it was terrible. 





Tl;dr... don't take adderall with a huge amount of coffee, you will crash and feel like you have the flu.
topics.author: 37e5b9d66361642500af5e00

Too bad modern YTPs are nothing like this.
Which is why I don't find myself watching them anymore. Or at least, any "modern" ones.
That, and too many of the "good" YTPs have either retired or actually died off.

"@ToskiHero":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e373a46368727ad5451000#post_54e373a46368727ad5451000
Waxonator is completely gone, he vanished off of the face of the internet about a year ago I believe

A lot of the other greats are at least on indefinite hiatus, but some like Hurricoaster are trying to come back with little success

YTP is pretty much a legacy at this point
